name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in crafting innovative solutions using **React**, **Typescript**, **GraphQL**, and **Python**. Proven proficiency with database technologies such as **MySQL**, **MyRocks**, and caching systems like **Memcached** and **Redis**.  Specialized in developing robust APIs and scalable backend services, complemented by a solid foundation in automated tools and cloud-native architectures. Successful in driving high-impact projects within top-tier organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, showcasing a strong commitment to excellence and continuous improvement in the software development lifecycle.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed user-friendly frontend applications using **React** and **Typescript** to enhance user experience and engagement by over **40%**.
Engineered backend services in **Python** using **FastAPI** to streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows, reducing processing times by **30%**.
Implemented efficient data storage solutions with **MySQL** and **MyRocks**, improving query performance by **25%**.
Developed event-driven solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** to manage asynchronous processing for financial transaction requests, ensuring high availability and responsiveness.
Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and utilized **Terraform** to manage infrastructure as code, ensuring seamless cloud operations and reducing deployment times by **50%**.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring timely and accurate data flow for compliance.
Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure, scalable authentication systems, meeting industry standards.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensure compliance, and oversee release strategies, managing releases with minimum downtime.

• Developed scalable and user-friendly interfaces using **React** and **Typescript**, enhancing end-user experience and engagement by **30%**.
• Engineered robust backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, improving operational efficiency by **25%**.
• Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests with a **response time improvement of 15%**.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to support a consistent and scalable environment for over **100,000** transactions monthly.
• Designed and implemented data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring compliance and reliability in data flow management.
• Conducted security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and secure access controls.

• Collaborated with frontend teams utilizing **React** and **Typescript** to integrate data through REST APIs, enhancing user experience and reducing load times by **20%**.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory standards such as MiFID II and GDPR, while implementing internal data security measures, maintaining zero data breaches.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest** and **tox**, increasing code coverage by **40%** and improving QA efficiency through automated processes.
• Introduced job queuing solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing task execution by reducing processing time by **25%**.
